statements: SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_id, itinerary FROM tour_packages;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT package_id, package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_name DESC
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE package_name LIKE '%beach%' OR package_name LIKE '%island%' LIMIT 3
SELECT package_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM tour_packages GROUP BY package_name ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT DISTINCT package_name, price FROM tour_packages JOIN bookings ON tour_packages.package_id = bookings.package_id WHERE bookings.booking_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT package_id, package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE itinerary IS NOT NULL ORDER BY price ASC, package_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM tour_packages
SELECT package_name, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE duration > 5
SELECT description FROM tour_packages WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM itineraries ORDER BY day DESC
SELECT id, package_id, activity FROM itineraries WHERE package_id = 10
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE destination='Paris';
SELECT package_name, duration FROM tour_packages WHERE duration > 5 ORDER BY package_name ASC;
SELECT id, destination, duration FROM tour_packages WHERE duration < 7 AND destination='Tokyo' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, package_name, destination, duration FROM tour_packages WHERE destination LIKE '%Beach%' AND duration BETWEEN 3 AND 10 ORDER BY duration, id DESC;
SELECT p.package_name, i.day, i.activity FROM tour_packages p JOIN itineraries i ON p.id=i.package_id WHERE p.destination='Rome' ORDER BY i.day ASC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, description FROM tour_packages WHERE destination='Europe';
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE day_number <= 5;
SELECT package_name, start_date, end_date, price, currency FROM tour_packages tp JOIN pricing_information pi ON tp.package_id = pi.package_id;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_id, destination, description FROM tour_packages WHERE destination = 'Europe';
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price;
SELECT package_name, destination, price, start_date FROM tour_packages JOIN pricing_information ON tour_packages.package_id = pricing_information.package_id WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM itineraries ORDER BY package_id DESC, day_number ASC;
SELECT activity, day_number FROM itineraries WHERE package_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM travel_agencies WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages ORDER BY package_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT package_name, destination, duration FROM tour_packages WHERE destination = 'Paris' AND duration > 5 ORDER BY duration ASC;

SELECT t.package_name, i.activity, p.price FROM tour_packages t JOIN itineraries i ON t.package_id = i.package_id JOIN pricing_information p ON t.package_id = p.package_id WHERE p.start_date >= '2022-10-01';

SELECT t.package_name, i.activity, p.price FROM tour_packages t JOIN itineraries i ON t.package_id = i.package_id JOIN pricing_information p ON t.package_id = p.package_id WHERE t.package_name LIKE '%Honeymoon%' AND p.price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;

SELECT t.package_name, t.destination, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.price FROM tour_packages t JOIN pricing_information p ON t.package_id = p.package_id JOIN travel_agencies a ON t.package_name = a.location WHERE a.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT tour_name, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT tour_package_id, price FROM pricing_information WHERE discount > 0.1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, booking_date FROM customer_bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT tour_name, rating, feedback FROM tour_packages JOIN reviews ON tour_packages.tour_package_id = reviews.tour_package_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY tour_name DESC;
SELECT tour_name, destination, duration FROM tour_packages WHERE duration >= 7 AND price < 1500;
SELECT itinerary_id, activity, location FROM itineraries WHERE day = 3 ORDER BY activity;

SELECT customer_name, booking_date, tour_name FROM customer_bookings JOIN tour_packages ON customer_bookings.tour_package_id = tour_packages.tour_package_id WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT tour_name, price, availability, discount FROM pricing_information JOIN tour_packages ON pricing_information.tour_package_id = tour_packages.tour_package_id WHERE availability > 0;
